games.title: Rooftop Run
games.description:
Rooftop Run ‚Äì Race Across the City! üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüí®

Run, jump, and slide over rooftops in this fast-paced parkour game! Dodge obstacles, smash through barriers, and escape from enemies as you race through exciting levels.

games.title: Speed per Click: Obby
games.description:
"Speed per Click: Obby" ‚Äì An exciting clicker-speed simulator in the style of obby and blocky games!  

üîπ Key Features:  

‚úÖ Dynamic clicker ‚Äì Earn speed with every click and accelerate to incredible levels! 
‚úÖ Obby-style challenges ‚Äì Overcome parkour tracks with jumps and tricky maneuvers, just like in obby games! 
‚úÖ Progress & rewards ‚Äì Collect wins, unlock new locations, and upgrade your skills! 
‚úÖ Pets ‚Äì Buy pets to increase speed per click and beat levels faster! 
‚úÖ Rebirth system ‚Äì Perform rebirths to gain bonuses and speed up again!  

üåç Play in the best traditions of obby and blocky parkour ‚Äì It has everything: clicker mechanics, parkour, adrenaline, and fun!  

üî• Ready for the challenge? Click, jump, and become the champion of Speed per Click: Obby!

games.description: Road Crosser is a high-quality 3D HTML5 game built with Three.js, featuring endless city-crossing game play like Crossy Road ‚Äî but with a modern twist. Players must navigate through busy roads, forests, and city lanes while dodging vehicles and obstacles. With realistic lighting, animated environments, touch and keyboard support, and clean responsive design, this game delivers an immersive experience across desktop and mobile browsers.

featuring endless city-crossing gameplay inspired by classics like Crossy Road ‚Äî but with a modern twist. games.title: Slap Master
games.description: Slap Master is a light-hearted casual arcade game, where chaos and laughs are the point. You play as a character whose mission is simple: slap pedestrians as you run, build up the frenzy, and try to escape without getting caught.
games.howToPlayText:
Your objective is to slap (hit) as many pedestrians as you can, but then run (escape) without being caught. 
Swipe left or right on the screen to move your character in that direction.
You move through a level or area filled with pedestrians.
When you swipe into them (or come near), you ‚Äúslap‚Äù them.
After slapping, you need to escape  avoid obstacles or enemies, and don‚Äôt get caught.
As you proceed, likely the challenge is to maintain speed, evade pursuers, and possibly manage hazards or other impeding features. (The description is minimal, so some of these are inferred from how casual escape-games usually work.)

games.title: CrowdGate
games.description:
CrownGate is an addictive runner game that tests both your reflexes and strategy. Your stickmen run automatically ‚Äî your job is to guide them through the right gates, grow your crowd, and win the big battle waiting at the end of the road.


Features
	‚Ä¢	Simple yet engaging runner gameplay
	‚Ä¢	Strategic choices with number gates
	‚Ä¢	Colorful and dynamic levels
	‚Ä¢	Short, fast, and fun sessions
	‚Ä¢	Play instantly for free in your browser

üëâ Play CrownGate now, gather your crowd, and march to victory on your way to the throne!
games.howToPlayText:
‚Ä¢	Move left and right using your mouse (drag) or A/D keys on your keyboard.
	‚Ä¢	Pass through number gates to increase your crowd.
	‚Ä¢	Avoid obstacles, or you‚Äôll lose part of your army.
	‚Ä¢	Enter enemy zones and prove that the bigger crowd always wins.

games.title: Stand on the Right Color, Robby!
games.description:
"Stand on the right color, Robby!" is an addictive arcade game where your goal is to reach the finish line by jumping on colored tiles. You need to react quickly when the color tiles change randomly. You have limited time at each stage. Be vigilant and react instantly so as not to fall and get ahead of your rivals.

Your reaction, accuracy and skill will be put to the test. In this exciting game you have to fight for first place on your way to the finish line.

Earn in - game currency and unlock unique Robls skins, items and effects - this will add excitement and variety to the gameplay.

Are you ready to take on the challenge and complete all the tiles to the finish line in this incredible game? Defeat your opponents, reach the top of the leaderboard and prove that you are the best!
games.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to reach the finish line.

Computer control:
W, A, S, D, Right mouse button - character control
Space, Left mouse button - jump
Mouse - camera control

Mobile controls:
Left joystick - character control
Button on the screen - jump
Right joystick - camera control

games.title: Mega Jump
games.description:
The mega-hit mobile jumping game is now free to play online at Arkadium. No downloads needed‚Äîjump right into the action in your browser!

Strap on your jump boots and get ready to soar! Mega Jump is a fast-paced, action-packed jump game loved by millions. Dive into a world of thrills as you leap, dodge, and collect coins, climbing higher and higher into the sky.

Mega Jump isn't just another jumping game; as one of the best free jumping games available, it tests your focus, flow, and flair in ways other games can't match.

Want to float like a balloon? Done. Need to snag every coin in sight? The Coin Magnet has your back. Feeling fiery? Grab a Super Nova boost and rocket through the levels like a comet. Watch out for sneaky monsters, tricky traps, and gravity trying to pull you back down.

With stunning cartoon visuals, gorgeous backdrops, and challenges that keep you guessing, Mega Jump delivers nonstop fun. Unlock quirky characters‚Äîfrom daring heroes to adorable critters‚Äîand make them your jumping champions.

Whether you're chasing coins or blasting into space, this jumping game turns every leap into an adventure, proving why it's ranked among the best free jumping games you can play.

Play Mega Jump Online Today
If you're looking for more heart-pounding challenges and unforgettable adventures, check out Arkadium's collection of free online games that can be played instantly without installs or downloads. Experience the thrill of racing games that put you in the driver's seat or addicting games packed with nonstop action. Enjoy!
games.howToPlayText:
Your goal is simple: Jump high, grab coins, and soar to new stages. Miss a grab, and it's Game Over‚Äîstay sharp and quickly make your next move. Keep aiming for the highest score. Use the arrow keys to move left or right to jump on the platforms.


Mega Jump Game Tips:
Gold Coins: Snag 100 for a boost.
x2 & x5 Coins: Blue and red-centered coins are worth double and quintuple‚Äîcha-ching.
Trickster Coins: Watch out; these sneaky coins run away when you get close.
Moving Coins: Slide side-to-side to catch these shifty treasures.

Boost Stars
Shiny stars launch you higher. Yellow, green, blue, and red‚Äîeach more potent than the last. Collect as many as possible to gain massive boosts and fly to new heights.

Save Stars
Falling? Tap your Save Star to rocket back up. You start with 5, so use them wisely and don't waste them.

Power-ups to the Rescue
Umbrella: Float down gently and magnetize coins.
Jump Boots: Bigger, faster, higher jumps.
Magnet: Pull in coins like a boss.
Lucky Blast: Transform everything into coins and stars.

Avoid These Dangers
Anvil: Stops you cold. Dodge it.
Ball & Chain: Slows you down‚Äîugh.
Shrinkify Potion: Tiny and tricky.

Bounce on blocks, outsmart enemies, and blast past obstacles. Ready to jump into the fun? Let's go.

games.title: Chroma Trek
games.description: Immerse yourself in Chroma Trek, a breathtaking neon platformer that dazzles with vibrant visuals and innovative gameplay. Each level is a unique masterpiece, offering diverse challenges that keep you engaged and on your toes. The core mechanic of color-switching lets you seamlessly pass through various types of obstacles, adding depth and excitement to every moment. As you navigate through dynamic environments, you'll be uplifted by motivational messages from the creator, encouraging you to push forward and conquer the journey to the Finish Crystal!
games.howToPlayText:
Objective: Navigate through a series of challenging obstacles to reach the Finish Crystal and complete the level!

Controls: Move your character using one of two control schemes:
A or ‚Üê: Move Left
D or ‚Üí: Move Right
W or Spacebar: Jump

Gameplay:
Dodge Obstacles: Avoid traps, pits, and other hazards.
Reach the Crystal: Find and touch the Finish Crystal to win the level.

games.description: Control a lively red ball as it bounces its way down a snowy mountain! Avoid trees, rocks, and tricky obstacles to stay in the game as long as possible. The deeper you go, the faster it gets ‚Äî and the tougher the ride! Grab glowing crystals along the path to boost your score and test your reflexes. How long can you survive the snowy descent?
games.howToPlayText:
Control a bouncy red ball as it rolls down a snowy mountain! Dodge trees, rocks, and other obstacles while trying to survive for as long as possible. The faster you go, the harder it gets!

üéÆ Controls:
PC (Keyboard):
Press A or Left Arrow to move left.
Press D or Right Arrow to move right.

Mobile (Touchscreen):

Touch the Right side of the screen to move right.

games.title: Master of Numbers
games.description: Experience the excitement of mathematics with Master of Numbers, a fast-paced online game. Race to collect beneficial numbers while dodging harmful ones, enhancing your math and strategy skills as you progress through increasingly challenging levels. Play on your phone or computer for an engaging mental workout.
games.howToPlayText:
The goal: to reach the finish line by typing the maximum possible number.
Absorb numbers smaller than yours highlighted in blue. If you encounter a red number larger than yours, you will lose your number and you will have to start over.
Avoid electric saws, cross bridges and jump over ditches.
At the finish line you will find a lot of walls to destroy

games.title: Cosmic Dash
games.description: Cosmic Dash is an endless space runner where you pilot your way across the solar system, dodging space junk, collecting tokens, and smashing asteroids. The core loop is simple‚Äîtravel as far as you can while managing jumps, shrinks, and speed boosts‚Äîbut what makes it stand out is its layered mechanics: shrinking lets you slip through debris, boosts let you destroy asteroids, and big tokens chain into massive rewards. The mix of fast reflex gameplay, mission objectives, and planetary backdrops gives it a fresh twist on the classic runner genre.
games.howToPlayText:
üéÆ How to Play Cosmic Dash

Your mission is to dash through space, travel as far as possible, and collect tokens while avoiding or destroying obstacles.

Controls (Keyboard):

Jump ‚Äì Press UP arrow

Shrink ‚Äì Press DOWN arrow to squeeze through tight gaps and space junk

Move ‚Äì Use LEFT / RIGHT arrows to change position

Boost ‚Äì Press SPACE to speed up and smash through asteroids

Controls (Touch / Mobile):

Jump ‚Äì Swipe UP

Shrink ‚Äì Swipe DOWN

Move ‚Äì Swipe LEFT / RIGHT

Boost ‚Äì Tap the screen


ü™ê Tips & Mechanics:

Collect small tokens to increase your score.

Grab BIG TOKENS to automatically pull in smaller ones.

Use SHRINK to slip past dangerous space junk.

Use BOOST to destroy glowing asteroids and clear the way.

The further you travel, the more challenging and rewarding the journey becomes.

games.title: Geometry Maze Maps V2
games.description: Geometry Dash Maze Maps V2 is a fast-paced platformer where you control a cube through six tricky mazes. The game throws obstacles like spikes and moving platforms at you while your character speeds forward on its own, testing your reflexes. Time your jumps carefully - use the yellow boosters to reach higher spots and avoid instant-death traps. The more you play, the better your reaction time gets, so keep at it.
games.howToPlayText:
Speed will make it difficult for you to win the level, but that's what's challenging 
Desktop Controls:
Jump - Spacebar
Mobile Controls:
Jump - tap on screen

games.title: Schoolboy Escape: Runaway
games.description: Schoolboy Escape: Runaway is a stealth-based adventure where you help a determined kid outsmart strict parents and break free from his locked home. Navigate shadowy halls, avoid detection, and use clever tricks to carry out your great escape. You‚Äôve made a promise‚Äînow it‚Äôs up to you to keep it and reach your friends outside.FeaturesStealth mode: Hide, sneak, and avoid meeting your parents.Horror atmosphere: Beware of every unexpected sound, creak and rustle, peer into the dark corridors of the old house.Interactive house: Explore every corner of the house, and become a real detective.Realistic sounds: Listen to footsteps and rustles to predict the movements of parents.
games.howToPlayText: ControlsDesktop ControlsWASD = movementMouse = camera rotationLMB = interactionR = hintP = pauseMobile ControlsJoystick = movementScreen Swipes = camera rotationOn-screen buttons = interaction, pause, and prompt

- Hold the right mouse button and swipe to move
On mobile:
- Hold your finger and swipe to move

games.title: Steve parkour in mine
games.description:
Jump, run, and don‚Äôt fall! Help Steve navigate dangerous levels filled with traps, chasms, and true cubic madness.

The levels keep getting harder, and your reaction speed and jumping precision are your only hope.

This game is perfect for both beginners and those who consider themselves masters of parkour in virtual worlds.

Are you ready to show what Steve is capable of in the world of parkour?
games.howToPlayText: Use the WASD keys to control the character. Press the spacebar to jump. Use the mouse to control the camera.

Desktop: press up key to jump, press down key to stomp the ground.

games.title: Mine Jump
games.description: Join the exciting world of Mine Jump, an engaging online experience that merges quick thinking with rapid actions. Explore a captivating realm where each jump reveals hidden treasures. Enhance your character and uncover the mysteries of an alien planet, all while enjoying the thrill on any device!
games.howToPlayText:
Jump, jump, jump! A challenging reaction and logic game that won't let you get bored! Collect slugs, pump up your hero and find the edge of this planet!

Click on the left or right side of the screen to move diagonally on a cell. If you make a mistake, you can go back. Get as far as you can to find out all the secrets of this mysterious planet!

games.title: Rolling Balls 3D
games.description: Rolling Balls 3D is a casual game in which you have to test your reaction and dexterity. The goal of the game is to guide the ball through an endless maze of obstacles, collecting balls along the way to get more! The bottom line is that every time you collect a ball, a clone of your ball is created and added to the maze, increasing the difficulty as you progress!
games.howToPlayText:
Swipe your finger or mouse to move the balls from side to side and avoid obstacles.

Collect a lot of balls and reach the finish line to complete the level.

games.title: Raised Knight
games.description:
Get ready for the adventure in "Raised Knight," the endless runner where your skills will be put to the test!
Run through a world full of obstacles while trying to cover as much distance as possible. Every move counts, so make sure you master the controls!
games.howToPlayText:
Get ready for the adventure in "Raised Knight," the endless runner where your skills will be put to the test!
Run through a world full of obstacles while trying to cover as much distance as possible. Every move counts, so make sure you master the controls!

[A] / [D] ‚Üí Move:
Use [A] and [D] to move left or right. Dodge obstacles, take advantage of openings, and be prepared for any challenge that comes your way. Your agility is key!

[Space] ‚Üí Jump / Float:
Hold down the [Space] key to jump or float. Jump over obstacles or float in the air to avoid dangers that cross your path. Air control can be the difference between success and failure!

[Ctrl] ‚Üí Slide:
Use [Ctrl] to slide under obstacles and save yourself from critical situations. Slide quickly to pass under low obstacles and keep advancing without missing a beat.

games.title: Mouse Survivor
games.description: Get ready for the thrilling journey of Mouse Survivor! In this dynamic 2D game, you'll dodge dangerous snakes and tackle explosive obstacles while gathering cheese to explore new areas. Stay agile and quick to thrive in this constantly changing environment, available on both mobile and desktop!
games.howToPlayText:
How to play Mouse Survivor?

Keyboard Controls

W  / Arrow Up / Spacebar: Jump
A / Arrow Left:  Left
D / Arrow Right:  Right

For Mobile:Scroll             

üê≠ Run, Jump, and Explore Infinitely Divided Worlds with the Brave Mouse!üßÄ

Embark on an epic journey with our fearless mouse hero in this exciting 2D endless running game! 

üèÉ Endless Running Adventure:
Guide your mouse through a dynamic world full of ever-changing tiles. Watch out for those with lower alpha; One touch can be dangerous! Dodge, jump and slide your way through endless challenges.


üêç Encounter Sneaky Snakes:
Watch out for crawling snakes! Snakes will try to hinder your progress. Swipe right, left or up to perform daring moves and escape their cunning clutches. Can you outsmart the serpentine enemies?


üßÄ Cheese Collection and Upgrades:
Munch on delicious cheeses scattered along the way to increase your cheese count. Acquire new tile types by spending your hard-earned cheeses. Customize your running experience with a variety of tiles, each with its own unique features and challenges!
Good Luck...

games.title: Team Loyalty
games.description: Dive into the thrilling world of Team Loyalty, where you command a growing army. Start with one unit and strategically pass through gates to boost your numbers. Overcome challenges and dominate your foes with strength in numbers. Are you ready to build the ultimate team to triumph?
games.howToPlayText: For desktop, you can control the characters by swiping left and right with your mouse. For mobile control, you can move the characters by swiping right and left with your finger

games.title: Your Obby Parkour
games.description:
Enter a thrilling world of non-stop challenges! Run, jump, dodge, and conquer in the ultimate parkour platformer! 
Survive crazy levels ‚Äî from burning lava and icy slides to water traps and mysterious portals. Watch out for trampolines, spinning traps, and tons of hidden paths!

Play with friends and travel through fun regions ‚Äî from simple to brutally hard! Discover the hidden little dragon, collect trophies, and unlock secret shortcuts and bonus zones!

Be careful of:
Deadly skeletons
Lava-filled volcanoes
Slippery ice paths
Horror mazes where it's easy to get lost!

Ready to be a true parkour master? Find the fastest paths, conquer extreme stages, and show the world your skills!

Perfect for fans of obby-style maps, parkour games, secrets, adventures, and multiplayer fun!
games.howToPlayText:
The goal: get to the end.

Control:
WASD - movement.
Space bar - jump.
TAB - pause.
Shift - cursor.
Mouse wheel - zoom in/out.

On the phone:
Use the game interface.
